page.title: 05Churches in the Mellor Area
page.content: St.Mary'S CE Mellor is a Royal parish with its church in the centre of the village. The task of repairing the roof after an attack of dry and wet rot is completed and the roof repair fund has almost reached its target of Â£65 000 . The church has close links with the school. The vicar is the Chairman of the Board of Govenors and takes the school assembly every Friday morning. The building of the second phase of St Mary's CE School will begin in September, also a new vicarage is planned nearby.{St Mary's {RC}has also been repairing their church roof; and the High Altar has been reduced in size and brought forward so that the priest can celebrate mass facing the people. Most of the parish live in Mellor; so St George's was built in 1969 to provide a parish hall.
